topic.title: Using Your Quick Add Feature
topic.p: Contacts are stored in your Address Book.

ol.title: To add a contact using Quick Add:

li.p: In the Address Book menu group, click Addresses (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary).

ol.li:
Under Quick Add, type the contact information you want in the appropriate fields.
Note: Only an email address is required.
Click Add. A message appears informing you that the Address was added.
